0.5.0

0.3.1
 - MIT license
 - PowerShell module that encapsulates jshint.bat
 - MSBuild/Visual Studio-compatible reporter, used by default in PS module
 - node-jshint 0.3.1 (commit 1c5fe7cff2db230493a614a80eb2ea160f02381b)
 - node.js 0.5.7 (unstable)

0.2.3.2 
 - fix missing files from jshint (HELP, LICENSE)
 - fix problem when running with current directory different than the one with node.exe
 - readme update

0.2.3.1
 - node.js 0.5.4
